description: Related to population of numbers of form x^2 + y^2.
comments: Shanks' paper gives erroneous value a(16)=10555. - _Sean A. Irvine_, Feb 25 2011
references: N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: D. Shanks, The second-order term in the asymptotic expansion of B(x), Mathematics of Computation 18 (1964), pp. 75-86.
Index entries for sequences related to populations of quadratic forms
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: More terms from _Sean A. Irvine_, Feb 24 2011
